Highly recommended untuk hotel di kota cilacap..lokasi strategis, kamar nyaman, bfast lengkap, apalagi kolam renang nya anak2 sangat suka..pelayanan nya juga sangat baik dan ramah..

Saya berkunjung di bulan desember, sebetulnya cilacap hanya singgah, tapi ternyata kami punya pengalaman yg mengesankan. 

Belum sempat saya coba fasilitas karaoke dan spa nya, karena hanya menginap satu malam..next pasti saya coba lagi.

text:
Ini pertama kali saya ke Cilacap, dan setelah tanya temen temen kantor yang udah pernah ke Cilacap, di rekomendasikan ke Dafam Cilacap aja.

Saya chek in jam 7 malem, disambut oleh yang petugas FO yang ramah. Overall saya suka sama kamarnya, berkesan homy banget, cuman kebersihannya kamar sama kamar mandinya  aja ya yang perlu ditingkatkan lagi, biar nggak keliatan hotel lama, sama handuknya diganti dong, saya bingung itu warnanya putih apa abu abu. 

Pas saya mau keluar cari makan malam, saya bertanya kepada salah satu staff di lobby, kalau nggak salah namanya pak wisnu, saya di rekomendasikan untuk makan malam  di hotel aja karna malam itu ada live music.

Akhirnya saya memutuskan untuk tetap di hotel dan menikmati makan malam saya (banyak menu promo ternyata he..he...) sambil diiringi live music di hotel.
Thank's buat pak wisnu yang friendly and helpfull banget. 

Next time kalo dapet job ke Cilacap lagi, saya pasti bakal stay di sini lagi.

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Saya menginap pada tanggal 22 Mei 2017 di kamar tipe Superior king dan twin bed no 251 dan 244, berikut ulasan saya : 

1. Lokasi :
Plus:
(+) Lokasi berada di salah satu jalan protokol. Sehingga mudah kemana-mana. Tapi saya kurang hafal apakah ada angkutan umum lewat atau tidak karena saya membawa kendaraan sendiri.
(+) Dekat dari pantai penyu, sama dekat ke benteng pendem.
(+) Sekitar hotel kalau malam banyak penjual makanan kaki lima, dan depan hotel ada minimarket.

Minus:
Tidak ada minus.

Lokasi Rating : 🌟🌟🌟🌟

2. Fasilitas: 
Plus : 
(+) Free wifi di semua area.
(+) Ada outdoor swimming pool yang cukup lumayan besar.
(+) ada meja biliar.
(+) ada ruangan pusat kebugaran atau tempat fitness.
(+) ada massage bagi yg capai beraktifitas.
(+) ada coffee shop dan restaurant.
(+) room service.

Minus :
(-) Tidak ada lift. Jadi buat orang tua atau manula hotel ini tidak cocok. Karena lumayan cape menuju kamar. Apalagi bentuk bangunan memanjang dan banyak lorong sehingga dari lobby menuju kamar pasti cape. Saya heran kenapa hotel bintang 3 tidak menyediakan lift. Karena lift udh menjadi kebutuhan tamu apalagi yang sepuh.

Fasilitas rating : 🌟🌟🌟

3. Bedroom: 
Plus: 
(+) Kasur double bed cukup nyaman.
(+) Kebersihan kamar cukup terjaga dengan baik. 
(+) ada ac yang bekerja dengan baik.
(+) ada Kettel pemanas air untuk menyeduh kopi/teh.
(+) free 2 buah botol air mineral.
(+) ada sandal hotel.

Minus:
(-) ac bocor sehingga menetes ke lantai.
(-) kamar sangat sempit.
(-) tidak ada lemari untuk menyimpan baju. 
(-) kamar tidak kedap suara. 

Bedroom rating: 🌟🌟🌟

4. Bathroom: 
Plus:
(+) Kamar mandi bersih.
(+) ada shower yang bekerja dengan baik mengeluarkan air panas.
(+) amenities mandi cukup lengkap.

Minus: 
(-) kamar mandi cukup sempit.
(-) kalau mandi memuat becek kemana2.

Bathroom rating: 🌟🌟🌟

4. Food & Beverage:
Plus: 
(+) rasa makanan cukup enak.
(+) variasi makanan untuk sekelas bintang 3 cukup lengkap.
(+) banyak makanan cemilan daerah dan minuman tradisional.

Minus: 
(-) tidak ada minus dari segi makanan hanya saja ketika sarapan tempat breakfast sangat penuh sehingga kami susah mencari tempat yg kosong.

Food & Beverage rating: 🌟🌟🌟🌟

5. Service:
Plus:
(+) Semua pegawai ramah.
(+) Petugas front office cukup cepat mencarikan kami kamar sesuai dengan request kami.
(+) Welcome drink sangat bagus karena selain teh dan kopi disediakan snack traditional.

Minus:
(-) ketika breakfast piring bekas tidak segera diangkat. 

Service rating: 🌟🌟🌟🌟

Kesimpulan :
Hotel ini saya rekomendasikan untuk para pembaca tripadvisor dan kolega saya karena dengan budget yg ramah dikantong dapat fasilitas yang sangat bagus. Tapi untuk para orang tua atau manula saya sarankan untuk mencari hotel lain di Cilacap.

text: Saya mencoba hotel ini mengingat saya mencari hotel yang dekat dengan wilayah kota Cilacap sendiri. Awalnya sedikit bimbang karena ada beberapa pilihan hotel lain di Cilacap yang lumayan bagus dan mungkin lebih baru. Namun ketika saya check in semua terjawab kenapa saya memilih hotel ini. Mulai dengan adanya fasilitas penjemputan dan pengantaran gratis di area Cilacap, Pelayanan luar biasa dari petugas reception yang cukup sabar walaupun banyak pertanyaan yang saya tanyakan, bahkan semua bisa terjawab dengan baik, bahkan mereka banyak merekomendasikan beberapa tempat wisata di Cilacap, saya cukup tertarik sih tapi saya harus kembali ke Jakarta secepatnya. Nilai minusnya hotel ini hanya kebersihannya dan service untuk alat - alat di kamar, saya rasa akan lebih baik bila hal ini lebih di perhatikan. Nilai plusnya lagi breakfast untuk hotel ini cukup variatif dan lumayan enak. Tapi untuk pelayanan saya akui hotel ini sangat bagus meskipun fasilitas untuk room masih sedikit kurang / perlu perbaikan.

text:
Proses cek in lancar, staff hotel helpful dan ramah. Kamar pool view tapi jauh dari lobby dan resto. Kamar cukup besar, kasur nyaman, ac dingin. Design dibuat fresh tp kesan tua msh sangat terlihat dan terasa. Furniture dan finishing tidak rapi. 

TV kamar LED dan kecil, channel standard pay tv. Sinyal wifi bagus, kecepatan rata2. Laundry 24 jam dan harum. 
Makanan (room service) enak, porsi besar dan mantap. Menu breakfast banyak dan ada traditional food corner.

Kolam renang bersih, pool shower kotor dan rusak. Kolam hanya cocok untuk fun swimming karena pendek sekitar 7/8M, 1.25 depth. 

Hotel ini strategis, di tengah kota. Dekat ke pantai dan alun2..
title: Hotel di tengah kota

text:
Secsra umum hotel ini tidak buruk, madih termasuk kategori baik. Namun kunjungan saya di bulan ini sedikit tidak mengenakan. Kebersihan kamar juga harus ditingkatkan, terlebih disalah satu kamar yg sy masuki sebelum pindah kamar masih tertinggal pampers di jendela kamar. Breakfast pilihannya banyak hanya sayang banyak menu yg sdh habis tidak segera diisi kembali hingga sy menanyakan kpd karyawannya.
Sangat disayangkan penurunan kwalitas ini di tengah oersaingan hotel di cilacap yg sdg ketat.

text:
1. Pada saat baru check in sekitar pukul 11.00 pm, saya mendapati kamar mandinya cukup jorok dengan bukti kecoa yang berkeliaran di cermin dan kondisi dasar kloset yang kotor, periss kondisi dasar kloset yang tidak pernah disikat. 
2. Kondisi meja nakas yang sudah hampir patah yang kami sadari ketika anak kami bermain didekatnya dan nyaris saja membahayakan anak kami karena hampir menimpanya. 
3. Keesokan harinya kami mendapati air panas tidak menyala. alhasil anak kami yang masih bayi tidak mandi karena tidak ada air panas. sudah kami komplain ke resepsionis dan tidak ada tindak lanjut karena memang sudah 1-2 jam sebelum batas check out. 
4. AC yang bocor, kami telat menyadari sehingga sudah mendapati tumpukan baju kami basah. dan terpaksa menggunakan handuk hotel untuk mengelap banjir air AC tersebut. 
5. kondisi restoran yang tidak siap menghadapi lonjakan pengunjung saat breakfast yang dibuktikan dengan : 
a. lantai yang sangat jorok bekas makanan yang terinjak-injak pengunjung. saya sudah melakukan komplain namun sampai dengan kami selesai breakfast tidak ada pembersihan, jujur mengurangi selera makan kami. 
b. makanan yang tidak segera di-refill sehingga kami memiliki keterbatasan dalam makan paginya. butuh sekitar 1 jam makanan kembali ter-refill (setelah kami selesai makan yang seadanya). 
c. piring-piring yang tidak segera diambil. 
6. penganganan komplain yang tidak serius dibuktikan dengan kami hanya menghadapi resepsionis magang dan seorang resepsionis senior.

text: Hotel Dafam yg terlelak di pusat Kota Cilacap ini pelayanannya sagat baik. Lokasinya yang strategis dengan tempat wisata seperti Pantai Teluk Penyu, Pantai Pasir Putih Nusakambangan, Benteng Pendem, serta disekitar lokasi juga terdapat tempat makan yang enak - enak. Good buat Hotel Dafam
title: Hotel Dafam Strategis

text:
Pada tanggal 1 November 2014, saya bersama 5 rekan saya melaksanakan OJT (On The Job Training) dari perusahaan tempat saya bekerja selama 3,5 bulan di Cilacap, Jawa Tengah. Selama periode OJT, kami diberikan fasilitas penginapan di Hotel Dafam Cilacap. 
Kawasan hotel ini memiliki letak yang strategis, yaitu dekat dengan pantai teluk penyu, pusat perbelanjaan Giant, Rita store, Alun-alun Terminal bus untuk akses ke kota lain dsb. Menurut saya hotel Dafam sudah recommended untuk dipilih sebagai tempat menginap ketika sedang berada di Cilacap. 
Pelayanan di hotel tersebut menurut saya sudah sesuai dengan standar hotel pada umumnya. Namun yang membuat saya terkesan dan betah untuk long stay disana adalah fasilitas yang diberikan memadai, tersedianya sarana kolam renang dsb, kamar yang cukup nyaman dengan arsitektur semi-modern, menu sarapan yang beraneka-ragam, serta keramah-tamahan para karyawan yang selalu siap untuk memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik. Untuk kekurangan yang saya jumpai adalah AC di kamar kerap mengalami kebocoran kecil. Diharapkan dari pihak hotel dapat lebih memperhatikan mengenai hal tersebut.
title: Pengalaman long stay @Hotel Dafam Cilacap, Jawa Tengah, selama 3,5 bulan

text:
Secara keseluruhan hotel ini mempunyai banyak kelebihan dibanding hotel lain. Harga yang diberikan cukup sesuai dengan fasilitas yang mereka berikan kepada tamu. Pelayanan yang mereka berikan juga cukup memuaskan. Bapak Ian sebagai General Manager di hotel dafam cilacap juga dapat merangkul tamu dengan baik dan sangat bersahabat dengan tamu. Saya sangat terbantu dengan pelayanan yang di berikan beberapa staff di dafam seperti Sdri. Halimah dan Sdri. Ella, mulai dari informasi ketersediaan kamar hingga saya check in di hotel tersebut.

Hanya saja untuk wifi yang ada di hotel ini perlu ditingkatkan lagi, karena berbeda dengan hotel lain yang saya singgahi sebelumnya. Kecepatan wifinya masih kurang di hotel ini. Menu breakfast sangat variatif. Untuk kebersihan kamar dan yang lainnya serta lokasi sudah sangat bagus dan pas.
title: hotel yang nyaman

text: Walaupun kota kecil ternyata Cilacap mempunyai hotel berbintang yang lumayan bagus, menu sarapan bervariasi, sayang tidak ada lift, kolam renang yang lumayan. Yang mengecewakan saya mendapat kamar yang ACnya rusak, airnya bocor kemana-mana, walaupun sudah diperbaiki tetap menetes dan lantai basah. Sangat berbahaya jika membawa anak. Padahal saya berharap mendapat kamar lain. Design hotel yang minimalis modern cukup cantik, jika ke Cilacap pengen nginep disini lagi tapi dengan kamar berbeda.
title: AC Bocor

text:
Hotel ini nyaman sekali, ini kali kedua saya menginap di hotel ini. letak yang sangat strategis dekat dengan pantai. Sarapan lumayan enak, dan bervariatif.
Hanya saja, agar diperhatikan untuk AC kamar yang bocor serta kurang dingin.
Dilengkapi dengan kolam renang yang menyenangkan.
title: Hotel bagus AC bocor WiFi kurang

text:
Salah satu hotel terbaik di kota Cilacap. Cocok sekali untuk pebisnis atau pekerja yang dinas ke Pertamina atau Holcim. Jarak hotel dengan kedua tempat tsb hanya 10-15 menit dgn kendaraan. Ammenities kamar cukup lengkap, sarapan pagi juga variatif dengan beberapa minuman spesial seperti wedang jahe atau teh tarik. Ada meja billiard yang bisa dipakai hanya dengan tambahan pesan minum di Cafe. Afternoon tea package super murah 12 ribu saja.
Dan untuk para pria penyuka hiburan malam, persis di samping hotel ada executive club dan spa yang bisa jadi pelepas kepenatan setelah seharian bekerja.
title: Cocok untuk pebisnis or man travellers

text:

Yang pasti staf nya sangat ramah, makanannya juga lumayan, harga tidak mahal.

title: Cukup mengakomodasi business trip

text:
Hotel ini pilihan utama ketika kami bermaksud mengunjungi saudara di cilacap yg tidak bertemu selama hampir 25 tahun, kami mendapat kamar executive, tepat didepan kolam renang. Hotel tampak baru, bersih dan fresh, waktu cek-in kami sdh kemalaman sekitar jam 19.00, tp tidak mengurungkan niat kami utk berenang, dan kolam renang airnya bersih dan segar. 
Kamar executive cukup luas, dan fasilitas Wi-Fi nya cepat, sangat berguna utk bbrp approval pekerjaan yg menunggu, dan syukurlah masih bisa terkejar di akhir bulan Juni kemarin.
Yang unit kamar mandinya, disamping shower dan toilet, ada gentong besar, mungkin utk merasakan sensasi mandi di kampung.
Menu breakfast enak dan lengkap, termasuk hidangan2 lokal spt nasi pecel, dan Soto Madura. 
RECOMMENDED bila anda ingin berwisata ke Cilacap
title: Best in Cilacap

text:
Stayed at Dafam Hotel for over one month. Staff are very friendly and everyone is always willing to assist with any needs while staying in Cilacap. Food overall is good, especially the morning breakfast buffet!  Ala carte items do tend to take a while, but worth the wait for certain items.  

There is a small lounge with live music starting from 7 pm till 11 pm and a fairly good selection of bottled beers - San Miguel, San Miguel Light, Bintang, Guinness (several versions) and wine is also available.  

Swimming pool, fitness center and wifi available throughout the hotel. 

For small short trips around Cilacap, the hotel vehicle is available - and they also offer pick ip and drop off to local train station/airport and even to Purwokerto and Yogyakarta (for a fee).
title: Everything you need in one venue

text: 8 day business visit with 8 colleagues, plus's, and minus's. Start with the minus's, several of my colleagues experienced a lack of hot water for several days. Some had rooms with air con. problems, some experienced drainage problems, others heard animals scuttling in the ceiling voids. The entertainment in the Orchid lounge was usually turned up so loud you had to shout to hold a conversation, it was a regular occurrence for dishes on the restaurant menu not to be available... Now the plus's. The restaurant was much better than a competitor hotel nearby, the staff were very helpful and pleasant to deal with. The Orchid lounge sold Bintang beer, other hotels were "dry".  The room rate was very reasonable. The gym was clean and tidy, but a little barren. In summary, not a luxury hotel, but eminently bearable..
title: Mixed reviews

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I visited this hotel first time 4 years ago when it was very new and just recently opened. At that time me and my wife were extremely happy for our stay at Dafam Hotel, so based on this experience we had high expectations when we decided to stay at this hotel during our trip to Cilacap. We had reservation for Executive room type. We had communicated with hotel staff couple of times before our arrival about our needs, but we faced huge disappointment when checked in; the room that was given to us was dirty left-over room on 1st floor of the hotel. Room were divided to 2 small areas; one for bedroom and one for something else...just extremely weird layout and it looked like it had been used for something else than a room before and hotel staff claimed it was Executive room. Also, room was dirty, toilet smell urine and poops and there was some bugs walking on the walls. Once we complain about the room hotel reception staff told us that they think this really good room for us lol - seriously ! I couldn't even walk in the room without shoes. Finally after discussing with Manager on Duty we decided to move for another room (Deluxe) for one night and the following night we would get another Executive room. Well, yes we got another Executive room, which was clean as any room should be. Room suppose to have been non-smoking (according to staff), but everything when we stepped in to room from outside there was strong cigarette smell.Just so annoying smell!

Our original plan was to stay at this hotel for 6 nights, but we finally got enough with all disappointments, dirty rooms, cigarette smells, etc. that we decided to move to Fave Hotel very close to Dafam. Fave hotel has just recently opened in June 2016 and I'm actually writing this review at my room over there. 

Also, I am quite much surprised the quality of this hotel has dropped down so badly during past 4 years. It seems like there's no much maintenance work been done during this time. Carpets along the hallways had lots of stains as well as walls in the rooms, water taps in the toilet were dirty, etc. I don't really blame regular staff of this hotel, but it's the responsibility of hotel management to make sure hotel keeps running and it's being maintained well for customer's convenience. In our case this hotel lost one customer and we won't be back at Hotel Dafam !

One more interesting point; last evening around 6:30PM I had one drink at Dafam 1st floor bar and one local guy came and asked bar tender to give him 4 or 5 bottle of beers. I asked this guy if he is going to drink all of them....he said for sure he will because it's so hot outside so cool beer is good. Later on bar tender told me, that this guy was the General Manager of the hotel. Hmmm...perhaps GM should pay more attention of his hotel well being rather than drinking beer !
title: Extremely Disappointed

text:
Visited here earlier this year for a family event in town. I would categorize this hotel as somewhere between 2 to 3 star hotel, in terms of quality, which is the correct positioning for Dafam.
Being in a small town lacking of good accomodation facilities, this hotel easily won the competition in town. It has swimming pool, pool table, and a bar with live music. It has everything one would require for a decent stay (especially in my case, with family). With the economy of Cilacap, I figure that not many would gamble to construct better quality hotel than this one. So at least for a few years ahead, this would probably still be the most decent hotel accommodation in town.
title: Most Decent (so far) in Town

text:
Centrally located, the Dafam Hotel is one of the best hotels in Cilacap.  It is a decent three star facility with a small lobby, large restaurant, and a very smoky bar. The hotel also has a pool, but we found it too poorly maintained to use. 

Our room was quite large and clean with standard facilities plus a small sitting area on the veranda in back. The bathroom was simple but adequate with a very slim shower area and a towel rack so high the average Indonesian would find it a stretch to even reach it. 

The restaurant where we had dinner and breakfast was spacious but not particularly well-lit.  The food was tasty, but we had to wait for over half an hour for it to arrive at our table.  Then too, the orders were served ten minutes apart, which meant that by the time the second person had been served, the first had nearly finished eating. The breakfast buffet featured a variety of standard dishes, including local cuisine, all very tasty.

The staff was very friendly and attentive, making our stay at the Dafam a very pleasant one.
title: Good three-star facility

text:
I've been asked by the lovely people at Dafam, in Cilacap, on south side of Java, to give them a positive review on TripAdvisor. It's a bit of a weird request - I was there covering the executions of Chan and Sukumaran, who were to be executed on the nearby island of Nusakambangan. It wasn't a holiday. That unpleasantness aside, I stayed in Dafam about five weeks all up. As did the families of some of those who were to be executed. The hotel was booked out at times but the very kind manager, Halimah, always managed to find space for myself and the photographer I was working with. The hotel is spotless, the rooms (by the pool) are very good, the staff is excellent, the breakfasts are fine, and the security is first-rate. I always felt comfortable leaving equipment in my room. I cannot speak highly enough of this hotel and its people. They made life very easy for us reporters, even as Chan's and Sukumaran's ebbed away.
Anyway, I was asked to do this, and do so in the spirit of friendship with the fine people of Indonesia.
title: Dafam - The Best Place in Cilacap

I've checked with my wife and 5 month old son. We've stayed here before and the rooms have always been ok.

 Our first room an executive pool room clearly hadn't  been cleaned in weeks the floor was filthy and the sheets even worse. After  complaining to front desk i was  then shown 3  all  with filthy bed linen with blood stains on one. 

They tried to upgrade us to the royal suite which we were then told wad also dirty
 Finally we got a room that at least had clean bed linen for us and our infant son to sleep in. There is only one crib for the entire hotel that is already I use. 

When we finally settled in and took a much needed shower there was no hot water.

Ants and  weird flying things share the room and they're probably quite satisfied. 

We on the other hand are not.  I'm not expecting the ritz carton but a clean  room and bed linen is at least a minimum  expectation.

The swimming pool is not that inviting, small and bit crowded. entertainment center is just a step away, karaoke and spa is available at the same location. Wifi speed is fast but it could be improved. Conclusion: It is the top priority hotel in Cilacap.

text:
As a regular visitor to Cilacap and guest to Dafam nearly 2 years, I would like to say Dafam is the best in such a small town. I started to stay here continuous nearly 2 years already from time to time in each year. And I can summery as below just based on my own experience.

1. Location: its a convenient place I can see, its near to the Cilacap train station, and you will be able to find Giant and other department store by walkable distance in this town.

2. Reception: I would like to say that the reception staff is the best in Dafam. They are very friendly and helpful. I always like to have some chat with them.

3. Hotel facility:
1) Wifi: probably its the mostly concerned issue by all the business-oriented people. I can say all the hotel covered by free Wifi, its easy for your devices.
2) Swimming pool: I only swam once at 2 years before. And its good for you to play water if you like swimming.
3) Lounge: you can enjoy your free time by stay at lounge, and mostly of the nights they have live music.
4) Room: mostly I am stayed at DLQ, its enough for one person stay with a queen size bed. The only thing I do not like is the bell ring. Its not sound-proofing, you can always heard your neighbor's bell ring, and its so clear that can make you misunderstand your bell is ring. 
5) Corridor: the corridor is clean, but the music can wake me up sometimes. As the room type that I stayed always at backside which the corridor very narrow, you can hear the outside corridor music in your room, its okay for the daytime, but sometimes it played after dark too. And the second morning it started again very early too, as I was wake up by that.

4)  Restaurant: beanfeast is colorful and rich in variety. But suggest to improve the room meal delivery service. Its little slow. 

All in all its still the best one in town for your stay, but still have some room to improve to make it better. If allowed, I would like to suggest below just based on my own experience.
1) Laundry service bell ring: I would suggest to cancel the staff to ring the bell one by one, actually i think if people have laundry they will call the room service, no need to ring the bell one by one in early morning. And, I can hear the bell ring clearly from neighbor by neighbor. Its not comfortable.
2) Corridor music: try to adjust the operating time, all day long is not enjoyable.
3) Room service: make it more faster for meal delivery from hotel restaurant.

Hope it can become better and better for Dafam.
title: Its best in town

text:
The accomodatiom is good rather than another hotel in Cilacap region. But the service  isn't well because there is only a bottle of mineral water. I thought that should be two bottles instead that room got twin bed. There is no lift and the stairs is to far away from my room so it's not recommended to elder user. The ambience in cilacap is quite hot but the air conditioner can't cope that problem well. 
The breakfast is quite delicious, but not fancy. 
Overall this hotel is good. But i think it should be better if the hotel give a paid facility such as rented boat or another water sports.

text: The staffs are very welcomed to all guests. Mostly they stay for business purpose, like me. It's located at the heart of Cilacap so it makes you easy to go around the city. text: very nice place, the team is always ready to help you and very welcoming and make feel at home, the hotel is quiet and the swimming pool just great : a pool for the young children and a big pool but not too deep ! the rooms facing the swimming pool are just great and you can stay chilling there amidst the beautiful trees and flowers and wild birds nesting around. the food is delicious and breakfast is just incredible. Not only delicious, so many different things to taste. everyday different fruits and puddings and cakes and a marvellous young team ready to cook mendoan, fried rice or noddles, omelette or eggs as you like... this place brought much pleasure ! Thank you to everyone,
title: excellent place !

text:
Excellent services paired with good accomodations. What could they bore, you ask?
A good night sleep and big wake up spirit ready to fight any challenges.
Food is delicious, a bit different from my palette, but good food for sure.
Room is clean, water run on temps, comfy bed, spacious, and moreover, extra room for guest and big blue pool.
Dang one of a best day of my life.
I actually happened to do an event here, which my wedding day.
Very good preparation and you got more than what you deserve. Ballroom is big and clean, with flexibility at hand. You can adjust your wants with your budget and they definitely will listen to your outrageous, demanding, accidental, and close-to-time-limit requests. xD

Well definitely recommended for you, who is on budget (probably), on schedule, on vacation, or even, on business or work.
title: Wed on a (day before) lunar new year

text: Dafam is a nice hotel with all the facilities you need, even a little fitness room and an open air swimmingpool is available. It is the closest hotel tot the beach and the colonial fort Benteng Pendem. The staff is very friendly, helpfull, and always giving you a welcome smile. The hotel manager even arranged transportation to the fort. Thank you so much for that. The breakfast is the most varied breakfast I ever tasted during my trips in Indonesia. Everyday new water bottles, towels and clean bed linnen make the stay complete. For a relaxed experience Dafam is the hotel to visit.

text:
The most important thing I want to share.. I really recommend this hotel for everyone!

When I arrived at the hotel's lobby, I was fascinated with the traditional Central Java costume wore by the bellboy. With his big smile and warm greeting, he helped me with my luggage and accompanied me to the check in counter. While waiting to complete my check in process, I was given a welcoming drink by the name of "Wedang Jahe" (sorry if I spell it wrong)..taste good, most likely ginger based drink plus some spices. One thing I cannot deny, the staffs are so warm, showing the true Indonesian hospitality! The room given to me was very comfortable, clean and well maintained. Thumbs up for the hotel wifi, fast and reliable. On the hotel's breakfast,  it was a buffet breakfast with a lot of food varieties to choose. A must try location for food seeker because the food was superb and delicious. The hotel is classified as 3 star hotel, but personally I will rate them 4 star because of its facilities and the strategic location. They have swimming pool, gym, karaoke and spa! Those coming to Cilacap, Hotel Dafam is non arguably your best choice to stay.. No wonder i will not think twice to come and stay again in this hotel. Congrats to the hotel management and all the staffs! Stay the way you are and keep it up..!
title: Great Experience & Warmest Indonesian Hospitality

text:
Around March 2015, there's a promotion board in street abt 50% off for using spa facilities. I came to hotel, talked with spa relaxation representative, n she gave me a nice information. My friend and me, both are female, this is relevant. We came to the hotel and got there to use the 50% off promo for nice full body massage, and sauna. In waiting the for massauer/our turn, we didnt see female guest at all inside the waiting lounge, all were male which alr changed into robe (we still in our own clothes). I thought that was weird, and impolite to the eyes. But then, there's no one said anything discouraging to us, so we'd waited. 
Well, putting it aside, we got the massage, alright. However, what a disappointment, when I asked up front in clear tone that we wanted to use the sauna facilties which was already included in the promotion package, the staff (all females) were very accommodating by NOT telling us in NOTHING whatsoever words that there IS NO sauna/whirpool facilities that is made nicely to be used for women! All the workers, staffers, inside the facilities are MALE except for masseurs and front desk staffs.
The whirlpool are situated not in a close room, wherein all eyes of guests and staff can see who is inside the whirpool! Sauna are built in front of the whirlpool, tiny small room, no attendance to help, no lock, not conditioned for women guests at all since we need to stay in full clothes to go in sauna (since when?) because it\'s a public area and male everywhere! What a shock!!!! 
If somehow the frontdesk/staff told us that the facilities are not female-friendly or even better are not designed for women to loiter around inside the spa facilities, we would not be there! To have a nice relaxation instead we were having discomfort and loathed! And we would not felt so uh humiliated! OR, when the promotion board were made with writing such as 'ONLY FOR MALE, sorry not female-friendly', we would not be there and be humiliated by our own carelessness, 'oh yeah, why we're not thinking that these kind of hotel maybe only will be male-friendly esp in small city like cilacap'. 
Of course we couldnt use the sauna, whirpool and even all the masseur were dressed in firmly short short skirt with nice fittingly t-shirt which curved their shape nicely. Ah, so we all know where all those targeted for.
title: The worse hotel management I ever know.

text: The hotel seems like the finest hotel in the city. What I like is that its location is near train station, and Teluk Penyu beach. You can even order a hotel car if you arrive by Train at odd hours (taxi is very rare here). It has many outdoor area and clean pool which I like. The food, hospitality, security, the amenities and bathroom facility is ok. TV and WiFi (basic need!) are satisfying. I would have given this hotel a 4 star, but the room I have is quite dusty. And I do think the sheets and towels should have been renewed. Not dirty, but some old stains are a little bit... Disturbing. Overall, I still recommend this hotel, but you just need to check your room condition when you first arrive :)
title: Comfortable

text:
Yesterday I stayed at Dafam hotel in Cilacap for my business trip, the only hotel in cilacap I saw best and I know that it is still new compare to others.
The price is not so expensive cause the room is small. 
The corridor towards the room is warm yellow looks dark, the room light temperature is also warm yellow. 
I don't really like the ambience and also it looks so dirty below the bed seems like had been a week they don't swept the floor. The worst is their toilet, they don't really care about it, almost every part of their toilet looks yellowish, really made me uncomfortable stayed there.
All I can say is if only the manager can always control check the room as often as they can, maybe it will be a wonderful hotel in cilacap, cause not so many hotel they have in cilacap right now.
For me... room hotel can be very simple but no reason for me if the bathroom is very dirty.
I'm sorry if I have to review the worst thing as I feel and saw it, to encourage the hotel to be a better one.
Thank u

text:
Spent 1 night in dafam cilacap, hotel located in town, priced above average compare to others. Small room (for standard room) with 22 inch lcd tv. Bathroom need to be improve, smells like ashtray, while booked the non smoking room
Breakfast is too standard, need to improve alot for the bread and cookies, not tasty at all
title: Average hotel but maybe the best in town

text: This is a business friendly hotel. Checking in and out was a breeze. I must compliment their staff and management for being attentive and ready-to-serve attitude. My room (someone gave the suite) was clean, comfortable and cozy enough. There is a music club next door that comes on in the evenings but they finished early enough for my sleep. The breakfast spread was good if you like local food. Internet connection was also good in the room and in the lobby. For a small city, this can be considered a good hotel. I cannot recollect any bad moments.
title: Business friendly hotel

text:
No complain for room standard, cleanliness and service. Pool is clean. Breakfast is ok albeit limited choice of food.
Advice: stay in second floor room as first floor room tend to have rats in ceiling causing disturbing noises in the middle of the night. Not that you can see any rat but you can sure hear them especially during the nights.
title: Good failities for business traveller

text: Never expected that in a small town like Cilacap such a decent hotel would exist. Newly opened. Rooms are clean and reasonably sized. Beds are comfortable. Nice swimming pool & Spa. Restaurant is quite good. Instructed the chef to cook food as per my direction and they happily agreed. The Best parts of the hotel are its staff. Extremely friendly. They go out of the way to ensure the comfort. A good hotel indeed.
title: Enjoyable hotel

text: Another night I spent in this hotel. Nothing special with this hotel, but until now this hotel is the best in Cilacap. Pros: manage by pro local chain hotel, friendly staffs, clean room, comfy bed. Cons: No gym center, not too fast check in, unstable shower, no elevator, dirty table at breakfast time, crowded parking area. A little bit pricey but no other better choice.
title: Nothing special but best in town.

text:
For a hotel in Cilacap, Dafam is quite expensive. But this hotel, in my opinion, is overpriced. It is not bad at all, but just does not live up to the standard. It was a two storey buiding, so they do not have an elevator. The room corridors was confusing and not offering a good accessibility. It was seemed modern but the bathroom, well, was poor. 
Why? Because the bathroom floor was quite slippery and there is only an overhead shower which runs cold and hot by itself. Also, the shower curtain was the most annoying, since it keeps on sticking on you while you're showering because the space is very tight. I think it is best if they use glass separators instead.
The swimming pool is located in the center of all the rooms in the hotel, so it does not have a privacy at all. Oh and for your information, there is no refrigerator in the room.
title: Expensive but Don't Expect Too Much!

text:
I were stay here for couple of day, after my boss requested. The hotel is still new, interior is ok, facilities ok, comfort ok, price alittle high, location still ok. Services is ok, breakfast ok, staff is friendly enought, cleanliness is ok.

Have swimming pool, spa & messages facilities.

So after a whole day busy day, u can put a cup of coffee, and feeling relax down with the hotel facilities, room dining is no menu book at room, so have no refrence when calling for a meal, price is abit too high, expecially the meal.
title: want find a comfort n luxury hotel

text: I don't even remember if I have visited Cilacap in the past, I know, I have passed it a few time, but not enough to have any impression of it.  I got to visit it properly last week and this Dafam hotel is decent for a small town like Cilacap.  Of course there's always room for improvement.  The staff were nice and very attentive.  The food was fine, although what struck me the most was the potato skins.  As long as I have lived, all potato skins I had were baked, this one was boiled and watery.  So wrong!!  The shower has good water pressure, but the temperature is not consistent.  Overall, it's a nice enough hotel, clean, and it's ok to stay for a few days and the location is perfect.
title: Decent hotel in a small town

text: Pros: Good hotel, friendly staffs, quiet and clean room with small LCD TV, fast check in and check out, average breakfast menu. Cons: No fitness center, slow speed free wifi internet - this hotel must find other internet provider better than mentari satria. Overall I have no complaint during my stay.
title: Good hotel

text: I slept at this hotel from 4 - 6 Sept 2012 in room 254. Pros: Spacious room, pool view, comfort linen,average breakfast menu. Cons: dusty floor but no slipper in room, house keeping didn't clean up my room on my 2nd day, weak shower, unstable free wifi internet connection.
title: Nothing Special

text:
I am happy to stay at the Hotel Dafam Cilacap, I can invite family. strategic place, clean room space is also nice, comfortable place for my children as well,
friendly atmosphere of all the employees here,,, good service is also satisfactory.
what cilacap Dafam hotel close to the PANTAI TELUK PENYU also NUSAKAMBANGAN Island, and many other attractions that can be visited,,
rich time of 1 day is not enough to enjoy the city cilacap,,,
disedikan the hotel car was always available to take our pick as well.
Nice, nice,,,,
I will be back again to stay overnight at the hotel Dafam
thanks for Dafam hotel on satisfactory service,,

The hotel need to upgrade the facility specially the gym,.

text: This time I got a room on the poolside - quiet area, best place to take a rest. The breakfast menu was not too bad, friendly staffs, clean room, but do not expect too much with the free wifi internet connection. The signal was good in room, but the connection quality was bad. My input to the hotel management: In my opinion, opening the hotel's swimming pool - which is located very close to the guest room - for the public, is not a right decision.
title: Recomended hotel in Cilacap

text:
Our initial thoughts- jeepers this was very far south in Cilacap which initially concerned us. However it is close to the beach and the Benteng Pendem (Dutch fort) so in the end it is very well located.

This is a new (6mth old) hotel which has only had a soft opening. Many rooms are not yet available and the pool is yet to be completed. However, despite these limitations we found, what was there, was convenient and as you would expect in a mid-range western style hotel.

The room, while small, was clean and had air conditioning, a flat screen TV and a desk. The bathroom, was very small but neat. (note, we took the basic room, others would be more spacious for not much more money).

It was nice to find a bar serving alcahol in this part of Java. Their G&T is with Gordons' and their Margaritas were the tiniest we have seen however both were tasty at approx Rp75.000 per drink.

The included breakfast buffett was excellent with a good selection and range of choice. Their nasi bunkus was particularly good. The rest of the meals were average, not excellent but with nothing to complain about.

Service was superb. The staff worked very hard to speak English though for many their ability was limited. Three of the staff spoke English well so this would not be a problem if you don't speak Indonesian. They were very helpful in advising us of the location for services and attractions going so far as to draw multipule personal maps. We can not speak highly enough of this crew.

We concur with an earlier reviewers room hint: while it is a long and convoluted walk to the rooms in the back, they are wonderfully quiet.

We would stay here again whithout hesitation.
title: Standard western hotel with promise

text: I stay in this hotel more than 5 times, from this hotel was renovated until opened for guests. you can't find any other hotel with real stars hotel's services in this town. the service was good even the staffs need to improve their services. nothing special with breakfast. you can find free wifi internet in public area and some room, the connection was so so. Overall the hotel was good then other hotels in Cilacap, but i think the price was still too high.
title: no choice in a town

text: I am from Belgium and stayed in this hotel for 4 days during my visit of cilacap and the area around. This hotel is very well located in the center of cilacap. Everything is within walking distance and staff is always helpfull in friendly way. Breakfast is ok and prices are good price/quality. I will recomand this hotel to other people who visit this area.
title: Nice charming hotel with very friendly staff

text:
Having stayed having stayed at 2 other hotels in the area since my arrival in this quiet and humble location this is truly really the best & only 3 star hotel in Cilacap.
This hotel is brand new and the Manager and all his staff were very welcoming and most professional .The majority of the staff are new to the industry and are still be trained and in the month I have been here there is real evidence that this 3 star hotel will soon have 4 star service right across the board 
The modern western style rooms are clean and spacious.
 After living in Dubai, Hong Kong and Thailand for the last 5 years Cilacap was a shock to my system and the thought of been here for 3 years was daunting and I was ready to leave until I found this hotel .
Criticisms if I am to have any would be the restaurant doesn’t offer enough Indonesian food but saying that the food quality is good and I have stayed here for over a month and used the restaurant almost every day

Keep it up and I look forward to the pool opening in the new year
title: Cilacap's trully 3* hotel

text:
I stayed at Hotel Dafam for 5 nights and absolutely recommend this establishment, the General Manager, Manager and all Staff were very welcoming and most professional and always willing to help when your Bahasa is limited or you need external services from around Cilicap to conduct your business. I can't speak highly enough about them. Fantastic place to stay!
This is no fake review I might add, I was genuinely impressed. It sets a high standard for its humble location.
title: Very Homely

text: I was part of a soft opening for this hotel on 7th Sept 11. Had a full tour of the facilities and very impressed. All rooms are very modern and well set out and you could be excused from thinking you were in a major tourist centre. The staff and management were extremely welcoming and helpful. The bar was stocked with lots of cold beer and there were several lounges to relax and chat. I look forward to returning when the pool will be open. I have no reservations in recommending this hotel. PS, I am an Australian expat who travels extensively throughout Indonesia.
title: New hotel in Cilacap

text:
今回は出張で客先手配のもと利用しました。
客先予約の問題で、小さい部屋に案内されたが、フロントスタッフに相談したところ快くグレードアップに応じてくれた。
部屋は広く、ベッドも大きめ。シャワールームは狭く、シャワー出口が小さく水圧が低いがちゃんとお湯が出るので問題なし。
ただし、洗面所一帯が水浸しいなること多々あり。
ホテルスタッフがとても親切で、近場の観光名所を案内してくれたりと楽しい滞在ができました。
また、是非利用したいと思います。
title: Indonesia/Cilacapならここが一番！

text: O hotel além de ser muito bem localizado, tem ótimas instalações, a comida é muito boa e o principal para eu recomendar, a equipe que trabalha no hotel é excelente! Todos competentes e solícitos o tempo inteiro, fazendo assim com que o hóspede se sinta em casa! O hotel se diferencia pelo excelente serviço!!
title: O hotel que se diferencia pelo excelente serviço!!

text:
D abord, il faut dire qu' il n y a pas beaucoup d hôtels à Cilacap et que a priori celui ci est le plus proche des standards occidentaux. 
La découverte, c est celle d une grande station balnéaire pour indonésiens. Aucun occidental, une impression de bout du monde... Logique que l hôtellerie ne corresponde pas complètement à nos critères. On a aimé la plage, les gens, la ville mais... Pas l hôtel. 
C est sans charme et sans fenêtre sur l extérieur. Pour des français qui ont traversé la planète... Évidement on cherche autre chose qu une cage à lapins !
title: Hôtel très moyen

text: ネットで事前に予約。14時頃にチェックイン。部屋は明るく清潔。照明は落ち着いた感じで、居心地がよい。室内には、ポットが備え付けられている。ミネラルウォーター、コーヒー、紅茶のサービスあり。館内には、プール、ビリヤード、SPA、カラオケや、ビジネスセンターのようなものがあり、レジャーにもビジネスにも対応できそうなホテルであった（もっとも、チラチャップは観光地ではない）。夕食はホテルのレストランで魚料理。これは1000円程度。朝食は宿泊料金に含まれているバイキング。バイキングは種類もそこそこ有り、美味しかった。ホテル前の道路は大きいが昼間は人通りは多くない。田舎町の雰囲気である。ショッピングセンターまでは歩いて10分程度。駅からホテルまでは、がんばれば歩ける距離だが、ベチャやバイクを使うのが一般的か。駅前にタクシーはほとんどいない。空港までは車で30分程度。前日にフロントで聞いたところ、Rp55000で送迎車を手配してくれた。
title: 価格以上のホテルです
